column4: new user question;  I want to run the command java -Xmx256M -jar FreeCol.jar in a launcher problem is it runs it as though i'm in the desktop directory. I can put the path in but then the game can't find the data files.  how do i make it run as though it is in the correct directory
Are you typing it correctly? Try using tab completion and remember that *nix is case sensitive
You need to unmount the partition first
